import React from 'react' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import products from '../products' import Rating from './Rating' function Product({product}) { return ( {product.name} {/*
{product.rating} from {product.numReviews} reviews
*/} ${product.price} ) } export default Product
